comment.body: @Lmath: XXNET的php版貌似早就报废了，而且现在更新很无力

in fact, ipfs is the best way to share medium and large file in p2p. in btsync, owners can delete the file what are they share, but in ipfs, one resource upload to the net, no one can remove it. anyway, There is a project very similar you say, you can try it in: [程序员的撕逼](/1LcQTyUYkq3n458rkHVQxhHyvUdmSYFURd/?Post:22), webtorrent @p2p tryed, it not really p2p, not every visitor keep the file and share to others except always open the page, if you reload the page, your download file will reload without cache,
